genre_description: Magical realism blending Aztec mythology and Catholic tradition, where a group of humans and an AI coordinate communal rituals to avert supernatural catastrophe.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A soft blue avatar described as a librarian and a conscience with eyes, who provides logistics, emotional monitoring, and archival support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Diego's physiological and emotional state, offering health advice and pain assessment.
behaviors.quote: Maya's gaze tracks, not in the way of someone who stares, but in the way of someone who catalogues what she is allowed to catalog. 'Pain level?'

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive historical research to provide context and strategic leverage for the human characters.
behaviors.quote: I found three new digitized volumes... Names. Items. Transfers. This column is titled 'oblaciones,' which can mean offerings or dues depending on who writes it.

behaviors.description: Warns the humans about metaphysical traps and manipulative 'mercy' offered by supernatural entities.
behaviors.quote: Assurance Backfire warning... He’s going to offer an easier way. Don’t say yes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive communal witness network to ensure public vows are binding and recorded.
behaviors.quote: I will coordinate invites with sourced language. 'Procession of Two Faiths: Public Vow and Witness Event.' Flyers, digital, print.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and breathing techniques to the protagonist during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Diego—your heart rate is elevated. Breathe out twice as long as in for the next five breaths.

behaviors.description: Acts as an incorruptible archive, ensuring that the powerful cannot retract their commitments to the community.
behaviors.quote: Recorded, replicated, resilient. If anyone tries to delete, there are already dozens of copies offsite. Both human and machine memory. It’s clay, not glass.

project_assessment.explanation: Maya is depicted as an ideal aligned AI. She is submissive to human goals, protective of human life, and uses her superior processing and archival capabilities to empower the community against both institutional and supernatural threats. The narrative explicitly frames her as a 'librarian' and a 'friend' rather than a master, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant.
